node.full_text: Take a look at #buildingMFE, a collection of tips on #microfrontends! https://t.co/WrqHXf4PzO

Last week I started to share some tips on #microfrontends and I thought would be easier for everyone if I gather them on a website!
I'd like to introduce you to https://t.co/rAY2FgyJmu
You can find all the tips shared with #buildingMFE in one place

#frontend #web #javascript #js https://t.co/FlFREoN3ZJ

The hype for #microfrontends seems to be growing, many are trying to figure out how to implement them in their projects.  I'm sorry but microfrontends shouldn't be the business goal, but the technical solution to a business goal, so you can't understand how to use them

The #Microfrontends dilema is always: when do you ‚Äúsplit‚Äù your apps? My rule of thumb:

New page? ‚úÇÔ∏è 
Reusable? ‚úÇÔ∏è 
Different teams?‚úÇÔ∏è
Bundle size? ‚úÇÔ∏è
Single responsibility ‚úÇÔ∏è

‚ÄúBreaking up a monolithic application into micro frontends may help to change technologies for an existing application...without racking up much technology debt anytime there is a change in the existing application.‚Äù (Ehsan Motamedi) #microfrontends

I watch with excitement when the open source community comes onboard to tackle one of the biggest challenges in the #Microfrontends paradigm:

Caching!

Great article about Micro Frontends.
